column1: Master of Science in Applied Marine Conservation
column5: This one year MSc degree focuses on core and specialist competences in key themes of fisheries, marine conservation; sustainability and ecosystem based management.Course HighlightsTeaching by research-active staff working in the field of applied marine conservation with particular interest in fisheries, marine mammals and seabirds.An applied degree with fieldwork, practicals and 100% continuous assessment.A major research thesis, in collaboration with a supervisor from ATU Galway and a supervisor from an external organisation.Location: Galway CityCourse DetailsYear
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
